about.title: About Geot√≠pico
about.subtitle: Discovering Manta's local gastronomy
about.mission_1: Geot√≠pico was born with the mission of promoting and highlighting the rich gastronomy of Manta, helping both tourists and locals discover the best restaurants and typical dishes of the region.
about.mission_2: We want to value Manabita culinary culture, making it easier to access geolocated information about restaurants and their specialties.
about.feature_map_desc: Explore restaurants on an interactive map that lets you see options near your location.
about.feature_filters_desc: Find exactly what you are looking for with filters by specialty, price range, and rating.
about.feature_gastronomy_desc: Discover typical Manabita dishes and the best restaurants to enjoy local cuisine.
about.feature_responsive_desc: Access Geot√≠pico from any device, with an experience optimized for mobiles and tablets.
about.sources_desc: Geot√≠pico uses data from Google Maps, a platform of maps.
about.contact_desc: Do you have suggestions, comments or want to add your restaurant? We would love to hear from you.

home.title: Welcome to Geot√≠pico
home.subtitle: Discover, taste, and share the authentic cuisine of Manta and Manab√≠
home.mission_text: To promote and celebrate the culinary richness of Manab√≠, connecting tourists and locals with authentic, responsible, and memorable gastronomic experiences.
home.vision_text: To be the leading platform in Ecuador for discovering, valuing, and preserving local gastronomic culture, driving ethical and sustainable development in the region.
home.why_text: Because we believe gastronomy is identity, history, and a driver of development. Here you will find reliable information, honest recommendations, and a community passionate about good food.
home.value_authenticity_desc: We promote what is genuine and typical of our land.
home.value_ethics_desc: We respect culture, the environment, and people.
home.value_innovation_desc: We bet on technology to connect and grow.
home.value_sustainability_desc: We support responsible and local practices.
home.value_collaboration_desc: We believe in working together with the community.
home.cta_text: Are you a food lover, curious tourist, or restaurant owner?
home.cta_text2: is your space to discover, share, and grow together.
home.cta_btn: Contact us and be part of the community

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Geot√≠pico.
faq.q1: What is Geot√≠pico and what is it for?
faq.a1: Geot√≠pico is a digital platform to discover, value, and share the traditional cuisine of Manta and Manab√≠. It allows tourists and locals to find restaurants, learn about culinary culture, leave reviews, and contribute to the local gastronomic community.
faq.q2: How can I create an account?
faq.a2: You can currently explore the platform without registering. Soon, we will enable the option to create an account to access features like leaving reviews, saving favorites, and adding restaurants.
faq.q3: I forgot my password, how can I recover it?
faq.a3: When registration is enabled, you will be able to recover your password from the login page using your email address.
faq.q4: How do I edit or delete my profile?
faq.a4: When registration is available, you will be able to edit or delete your profile from the account section in your user panel.
faq.q5: How can I search for restaurants or typical dishes?
faq.a5: Use the search bar or filters on the map page to find restaurants, dishes, categories, or specific locations.
faq.q6: How do I contact the Geot√≠pico team?
faq.a6: You can write to us at contacto@geotipico.com or use the contact form on the platform. We are also on Instagram as @geotipico.
faq.q7: How do I report a problem or make a suggestion?
faq.a7: You can report problems or suggestions through the contact form or by sending an email to contacto@geotipico.com. We greatly value your feedback to improve the platform.
faq.q8: Is it safe to share my data on Geot√≠pico?
faq.a8: The security and privacy of your data is a priority. We only request minimal information and never share your data with third parties without your consent.
faq.a9: We comply with privacy regulations. You can check our privacy policy for more details about the use and protection of your data.
faq.q10: Can I delete my account and data?
faq.a10: Yes, when registration is enabled, you will be able to request the complete deletion of your account and personal data from your user panel or by contacting us directly.
faq.a11: In the future, you will be able to receive notifications about news, recommendations, and important messages. You will be able to manage your preferences from your profile.
faq.q12: Is the platform free or does it have any cost?
faq.a12: Geot√≠pico is completely free for users and restaurants. We do not charge for exploring or appearing on the platform.
faq.q13: How can I change the platform language?
faq.a13: You can change the language from the top menu by selecting between Spanish and English. More languages will be added soon.
faq.q14: What should I do if I find inappropriate content?
faq.a14: If you find incorrect or inappropriate information, report it using the contact form or the report button (coming soon) on each restaurant.
faq.q15: Is the platform accessible for people with disabilities?
faq.a15: Yes, we work to make Geot√≠pico accessible, with keyboard navigation, proper contrast, and screen reader support. If you have suggestions, let us know.
faq.q16: Can I use Geot√≠pico from my mobile device?
faq.a16: Yes, the platform is fully responsive and works perfectly on mobile devices and tablets.
faq.q17: How can I contribute or collaborate with Geot√≠pico?
faq.a17: You can collaborate by suggesting restaurants, correcting information, or joining the community. Write to us if you want to be part of the project.
faq.q18: Where can I see news or updates?
faq.a18: We post news on the main page and on our social networks. Follow us to stay up to date with new features and improvements.
faq.q19: What should I do if I don't receive the confirmation email?
faq.a19: Check your spam or junk mail folder. If you can't find it, contact us to help you activate your account.
faq.q20: How can I add my restaurant or business?
faq.a20: We will soon enable a panel for you to register your restaurant. In the meantime, contact us by email to appear on the platform.
faq.q21: How do reviews and ratings work?
faq.a21: Soon you will be able to leave reviews and ratings about the restaurants you visit. Only registered users will be able to review to ensure authenticity.
faq.q22: Can I save restaurants as favorites?
faq.a22: Yes, when registration is available, you will be able to save your favorite restaurants to access them easily from your profile.
faq.q23: How does the interactive map work?
faq.a23: The map allows you to explore restaurants by location, view details, and filter according to your gastronomic preferences.
faq.q24: What filters can I use to search for restaurants?
faq.a24: You can filter by type of food, location, services, price range, and more. Filters are available on the map page.
faq.q25: How can I interact with the community?
faq.a25: You can share your experiences, recommend places, and participate in events or gastronomic activities that we publish on the platform.
